title: Acquiring a taste for Raffaella

description: The onset of menstruation leads to a curious mix of events when Raffaella shares the news with her traditional Italian Aunt. Together they make some special Italian love biscuits, "biscotti di amore", with a secret ingredient intimately linked with Raffaella's menarche. When the object of her affections tastes the love biscuits, surprisingly, he asks for the recipe.
